channel.title: [MT] General Guide on
channel.description: Recent content in [MT] General Guide on

item.title: Dreamstorm
item.description: Solo content which you can do once daily on each of your characters. Only requirement is to kill AT LEAST one mob to receive the reward for the character. By completing the vanguard you will get 500 Tikat. Depending on your ranking during the event, you will receive extra 500/400/300/200/100 Tikat. Remember that Dreamstorm is open 10minutes before, so you can pick up the quest. item.title: Field Bosses
item.description: Spawn Rates # Field Boss Monsters Ortan, Hazard, and Cerrus can spawn between 4hr 30min to 5hr 30min from their death. Images of new bosses will come soon. Spawn Locations # Hazard # Ortan # Cerrus # Razan # - Legia # - Rewards # Rewards are distributed based on individual contribution. Participants receive either a Raid Chest or Silver Raid Chest depending on contribution and one participant dealing the last hit on the monster receives a special Raid Golden Chest.

item.title: Mystery Merchant
item.description: Mystery Merchant is an NPC that sells goods in exchange for special currency called Nexus Mystery Merchant Coin. You can obtain Nexus Mystery Market Coins through Vanguard Boxes [PvE] or by Vanguard Rewards [Battlegrounds]. Mystery Merchants are changed significantly on Menma’s Tera. They spawn only in main city regions - Velika, Allemantheia, Kaiator, Baldera and their outskirts. You can find a lot of useful items when you go hunt for them.
